For once you are dead correct, Congratulations and keep up your good work
You have a great future and this stupid act is the beginning of the end of POHOTTUWA.
Champion has an enormous popularity amongst the Buddhist Public. With this dastardly act Pohottuwa has lost 30 percent of their vote base
I could guarantee that UNP could come back to power if people like RANIL MANGALA and RAJITHA are kept out of th UNP Campaign.

replies.replyComment:
You are not a slave but an idiot of the first grade
Why I appreciated Hirunikas address is mainly the time frame of Champika's arrest. Why on earth did the Police act immediately after the accident? If Champika actually was involved in the accident, he should be punished, then. 
This is a clear case of political victimisation , by some party having a grievance against Champika.
While Champika may have erred in this case where a human life is at stake by accident,only traitors to the Nation  purposely forget the services done by Champika during the  Elam war.
Your quoted name implies that you are an IMBISSILE having only an iota of intelligence to analyse a situation rationally and I do not wish to carry on or exchange ideas with people who are not worth my time.
Find an idiot to suit or match your mental capacity'

comments.comment: Future challengers are to be destroyed to remove them from politics so that Dracula generation can bite more prey and increase draculas. Champika cannot be bitten. Hunting by Draculas have begun. Bending the law too has begun. Bending has gone even to AG ''Thappula'' who eyes for next CJ. COPE is with Mahinda. He has the duty and responsibility to expose it to public. Instead Gota terminated the parliament obviously COPE report has big issues with the former Minister of Finance, PB Jayasendera, Cabral and Namal linked to Aloysius looters company.  MARA has the responsibility to ask Mr Thappula AG to arrest Tanul, Ravi and all involved in the robbery coup. MARA group promised that. Now they save them because Ranil saved them too. Ranil even saved Mr Sookara and his Mrs Piano. As did to Champika, Mr Thappula can file a case against Ravi for the old case of foreign exchange fraud.  Nothing will happen. Birds of the same feather flock (F..K) together. MCC was the big slogan by all Gota's henchmen except him because he has the duty as a US citizen to sign it. Mr Gemba has already gave 70% green light. That bakamoona, Bandula Mr Rs  2500 joker says MCC is now halted until the committee studies it. I thought they have already studied before they talked at meetings. People are not born today. All these pundits they have can study this if they want. Bandula shows he is the pundit in all matters. This is another blind-folding strategy to mark time until next election is over. No electric chair for the campaign. Swiss case and Geneva will be up for the campaign next. Now Sajith or JVP or Nagahananda or Peratugami or any other national organisation MUST study this MCC and expose fully its pros and cons siting examples from other countries like Haiti. Must do this soon before election. Monks like Bodu Bada, Maligawa, Bellanwila etc will never talk. Doctors are all numbed by Dracula bites.
comments.author: Wickes Anderson

Ane mnd. Oyal isis gna kth krnw maha lokuwt   April 21 pahrya gna yahapalna anduwa mokakd kriyamargya. Oppu und oyala oya kiyna dewl  ekakwt. Yahapalna aduwa klrwt ewa oppu krgnn puluwn und. Es arla blnn. Ethkot therei. Eyla anduw kle gnkot wrdi wlat hbi meyla anduw arn e ptte kenek gtoth deshapaln plignim. Mekd me rte thathwe. Patali oya thrm hrinm ai cctv mkuwe ai mewa yta ghuwe. Ai e lmya diha eka parkwt bluwe ntte. Oyal pta knndi dla bla mewa diha. Eki atht penne ntte. E amma withri dnne e duka. E amma thath nthi una data e ayiyt mkd wenne. Oyla kta hri ohm unanm es arei. Ane mnd klakirewa ape rte minussu ge adhs dkkm. Hirunik awa   Parliament awe thatha nisa e anukmpwt e awith anit ptten awe oylat mthk athi. Dn me ptte.eyt kiyn thrm sudu chrithyk newene.
